Package chess_pieces

Class King

java.lang.Object
chess_pieces.Figure
chess_pieces.King
All Implemented Interfaces:
IntBishop, IntFigure
public class King extends Figure
A class representing a King chess piece, extending the behavior of Queen.

      public Boolean moveTo(chess_piece_columns column, int row)
      Verifies the move King chess piece would do to the specified column and row coordinates.
      Specified by:
      moveTo in interface IntFigure
      Parameters:
      column - The column coordinate to move the King to.
      row - The row coordinate to move the King to.
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid, otherwise false.
